Functions
createMenuItemHTML
function createMenuItemHTML(
title,
isDraggable
)

Creates a menu item HTML element

Parameters
title

the title of the HTML element

isDraggable

boolean value of whether to make the HTML element draggable

Returns

None

makeTitleUnique
function makeTitleUnique(
menuItem,
title
)

Ensures that title of menu items are unique (handles an edge case)

Parameters

title

the proposed title of the menuItem

Returns
